dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5891 IH: Michelle Obama Nutritional Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Stockman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To increase the standards of school lunch programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Michelle Obama Nutritional Act.
The nutritional and calorie standards of purchasing for the National School Lunch Program shall be the same as those defined for purchases under the Supplemental Nutritional Assistance Program.
